command.help.title: :name - Aid
command.help.description: Here, ye find the important map links, mate.
command.invite.description: Here, ye can find the invite link for the bot, yarr.
command.show.found.title: Records find for :id
command.show.found.description: Details of the blacklisted record, argh.
command.show.not_found.title: No records find for :id
command.show.not_found.description: This matey has a clean ship's log.
command.support.title: Support
command.support.description: Here, ye will find the crew support server links.
command.whitelist.whitelisted.title: :username be whitelisted!
command.whitelist.not_whitelisted.title: :username is not be whitelisted.
command.whitelist.not_whitelisted.descri: Ye can add them using the command /whitelist add <user>
command.whitelist.title: Blunder
command.whitelist.already_whitelisted.de: This matey be already on the whitelist.
command.whitelist.added_success.descript: Ye have added the matey to the whitelist.
command.whitelist.added_failed.descripti: We're not able to add this matey to the whitelist.
command.whitelist.removed_success.descri: Ye have removed the matey from the whitelist.
command.whitelist.removed_failed.descrip: We're not be able to remove this matey from the whitelist.
command.blacklist.cannot_blacklist_bot_d: Ye cannot blacklist a bot matey.
command.blacklist.user_not_blacklisted_d: This matey cannot be removed as they're not be blacklisted.
command.blacklist.error_description: We're sorry, mate, but we cannot blacklist this matey.
command.blacklist.add.log.global.title: :user added to the global blacklist.
command.blacklist.add.log.global.descrip: The matey is now be blacklisted.
command.blacklist.remove.log.global.desc: The matey is now be free.
command.blacklist.add.log.local.title: :user added to the local blacklist.
command.blacklist.remove.log.local.title: :user removed from the local blacklist.
command.blacklist.insufficient_permissio: Ye need to be staff of FurRaidDB to add a global blacklist.
common.globally_blacklisted: Is it in the global ship's log?
common.locally_blacklisted: Is it in the local ship's log?
event.member_added.title: :id has boarded
event.member_removed.title: :id walked the plank
event.message.scam_detected: Please refrain from sharing suspicious maps in this ship in accordance with the Discord Terms of Service and our rules.
event.message.log.title: Scam detection
event.message.log.description: The matey's parley was flagged suspect 'cause it contained a potentially untrustworthy map link.
event.transition: We have transitioned to the use of slash commands. For further assistance, please use the command /help.
common.button.not_owned: Ye cannot interact with this button as you're not be the captain of this query.
common.button.confirm.title: Are ye certain?
common.button.confirm.description: If ye continue ye will remove the blacklist of the selected matey.
event.message.log.title.muted: The matey :username was given a timeout due to spam of suspicious maps.
common.alert.message.three: The crew be temporarily timed-out for 10 moments until further action.
command.blacklist.bulk.blacklist.cancell: All crew in the list will be released of the timeout in 60 moments.
